channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI 2024 event: How to watch new ChatGPT product reveals and demos

item.title: A Federal Appeals Court Just Upheld the TikTok Ban. Here’s What Could Happen Next

item.title: A Mysterious Respiratory Disease Has the Democratic Republic of the Congo on High Alert
item.description: The WHO has sent epidemiologists to the country to uncover the cause of the illness, which has killed more than 70 people, half of them children.

item.title: The Crypto Industry Hails David Sacks, Its New ‘Czar’

item.title: Y Combinator alum Nowadays, founded by sisters, raises $2M to automate event planning
item.description: Nowadays is a seed-stage company doing something really useful with AI. It automates large event planning from emails to phone calls. © 2024 TechCrunc...

item.title: Meta unveils a new, more efficient Llama model

item.title: A16z-backed Toka wants to help US agencies hack into security cameras and other IoT devices

item.title: 21 Gift Ideas for the Home Chef (2024): Vitamix, Cookbooks
item.description: From Instant Pots to ice cream makers to knife sharpeners anyone can use, we have ideas that will keep the curious cook in your life tinkering away.
